data.title: Afternoon Snacks
data.text: One of the good place to eat....they offer variety of Filipino Foods freshly made from their own kitchen, Variety of noodles that are really good for afternoon snacks ..the place is pleasant, the workers are very nice and the price is affordable..

data.title: Better than Chow King Next Door
data.text: The wife got the goto, pancit and something else that slips my mind.  But she loved every bite of all three orders.  If we come back to the area, I think we'll go to this one rather than the other.
